body:
- [#710](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/710) Explicitly call Cancel on IMigrationScope to rollback transaction contributed by Eivind Gussiås Løkseth ([eloekset](https://github.com/eloekset))
- [#691](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/691) Update typemap for mySql to reflect the increased length available to Varchars contributed by Robert Pethick ([RobPethick](https://github.com/RobPethick))
- [#686](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/686) Adding AutoReversingMigrationTest to test reverse logic is implemented contributed by Robert Pethick ([RobPethick](https://github.com/RobPethick))
- [#682](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/682) Update SQL Server Ce Generator to use SELECT UNION ALL syntax to support multiple row inserts contributed by Robert Pethick ([RobPethick](https://github.com/RobPethick))
- [#681](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/681) Fixed issue [#618](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/618) SqlServerCe Typemap contributed by Eivind Gussiås Løkseth ([eloekset](https://github.com/eloekset))
- [#679](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/679) Invalid syntax error if description contains quote contributed by Andreas Vilinski ([vilinski](https://github.com/vilinski))
- [#674](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/674) Unquote a quoted object name contributed by Mark Junker ([fubar-coder](https://github.com/fubar-coder))
- [#676](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/676) Firebird: Quote names beginning with underscore contributed by Mark Junker ([fubar-coder](https://github.com/fubar-coder))
- [#654](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/654) Oracle: Error when using single quote character ( ' ) as argument for WithDescription(string) method contributed by Sergey Baranov ([barser](https://github.com/barser))
- [#652](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/652) IndexOutOfRange Exception when rollingback a firebird migration on a table containing implicitly declared foreign key contributed by [amroel](https://github.com/amroel)
- [#433](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/433) Allow CurrentUTCDateTime SystemMethods in SQLLite contributed by Bill Belanger ([Merwer](https://github.com/Merwer))

Commits: [cac48b707d...f17dca3ba0](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/compare/cac48b707d...f17dca3ba0)

- [#665](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/665) - [T4]Missing quotes on AsCustom contributed by Giuseppe Lippolis ([spaccabit](https://github.com/spaccabit))
- [#663](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/663) - Fixed SqlServerCe typemap contributed by Nuno Santos ([nakataaaa](https://github.com/nakataaaa))
- [#649](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/649) - Fix incorrect console argument in DisplayHelp contributed by David Mohundro ([drmohundro](https://github.com/drmohundro))
- [#648](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/648) - Modified DefaultMigrationConventions to allow Tags to be inheritable contributed by Christopher Bright ([cbright](https://github.com/cbright))
- [#647](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/647) - Allow for types with no namespaces contributed by Steve White ([stevewhite](https://github.com/stevewhite))
- [#646](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/646) - Update OracleTypeMap.cs contributed by Tim McGee ([jarz](https://github.com/jarz))
- [#645](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/645) - Oracle: Improper Currency precision +fix
- [#641](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/641) - Add DateTimeOffset to Oracle type map contributed by Victor Grigoriu ([vgrigoriu](https://github.com/vgrigoriu))
- [#632](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/632) - fixed issue #446 (no semicolons after Update/Create statements in Postgres) contributed by Cristian Lupașcu ([wolfascu](https://github.com/wolfascu))
- [#631](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/631) - Fix bug #630 byte arrays aren't serialised correctly in postgresql contributed by Will Price ([willprice](https://github.com/willprice))
- [#630](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/630) - byte array throws a syntax error when inserting into postgresql +fix
- [#629](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/629) - changed MSBuild Migrate task to run in separate app domain contributed by Michael Murillo ([zendever](https://github.com/zendever))
- [#628](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/628) - SqlServer Ce requires NULL to be added to alter table script contributed by Tom Marien ([tommarien](https://github.com/tommarien))
- [#627](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/627) - Issue with running MSBuild Migrate task from within Visual Studio +fix
- [#626](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/626) - Tags attribute isn't really inheritable (even though it's "tagged" as such)...
- [#617](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/617) - SqlServerCe: Specifies NVARCHAR(16) as typemap for time +fix
- [#616](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/616) - SqlServerCe: Alter column to nullable does not work +fix
- [#446](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/446) - Postgres -of -p command does not generate semicolons after Update/Create statements +fix

Commits: [40a435a60f...cac48b707d](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/compare/40a435a60f...cac48b707d)

**Small breaking change**
- When using IVersionTableMetadata, we've added ApplicationContext and integrated IVersionMetadataExtended (ownsschema), either make the necessary adjustments or inherit from DefaultVersionTableMetadata

**Fixes**
- [#623](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/623) - Use semantic versioning on nugets
- [#622](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/622) - Removed version metadata extended contributed by Tom Marien ([tommarien](https://github.com/tommarien))
- [#620](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/620) - Datetimeoffset feature patch - not quoting the values appropriately contributed by Richard Bennett ([dealproc](https://github.com/dealproc)) +fix
- [#619](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/619) - Corrected SqlServer2000 typemap (closes #571) contributed by Tom Marien ([tommarien](https://github.com/tommarien))
- [#613](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/613) - #612 Update Oracle TypeMap contributed by Jonny Bekkum ([jonnybee](https://github.com/jonnybee)) +fix
- [#612](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/612) - Oracle TypeMap must allow up to 4000 characters in VARCHAR2 / NVARCHAR2 fields
- [#611](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/611) - add support of foregn key and index generation for postgresql's T4 ge… contributed by Yusuke Ito ([itn3000](https://github.com/itn3000))
- [#610](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/610) - Sql server exists performance contributed by Giuseppe Lippolis ([spaccabit](https://github.com/spaccabit))
- [#607](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/607) - Consider maintenance without tags and AsString Collation overload contributed by Kat Lim Ruiz ([katlimruiz](https://github.com/katlimruiz)) +Feature
- [#606](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/606) - Maintenance class without tags is not executed (it should) +Feature
- [#597](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/597) - Introducing FluentMigrator in an existing production database
- [#596](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/596) - Fix bugs and mistakes in firebird typemapping contributed by Lukas Wöhrl ([woehrl01](https://github.com/woehrl01)) +fix
- [#595](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/595) - improved character case handling in firebird contributed by Lukas Wöhrl ([woehrl01](https://github.com/woehrl01))
- [#594](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/594) - Smallimprovements and typo fix contributed by Lukas Wöhrl ([woehrl01](https://github.com/woehrl01))
- [#593](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/593) - fixed bug in and improved sql server schema dumper contributed by Lukas Wöhrl ([woehrl01](https://github.com/woehrl01))
- [#586](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/586) - Add application context to versiontablemetadata contributed by ([istaheev](https://github.com/istaheev))
- [#582](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/582) - Allows to specify custom version table meta data contributed by ([istaheev](https://github.com/istaheev))
- [#571](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/571) - NVARCHAR(MAX) on Sql2000 +fix

Commits: [78a817d78a...40a435a60f](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/compare/78a817d78a...40a435a60f)

Features:
- [#590](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/590) - Improvements for PostgreSql provider contributed by Mladen Macanović ([stsrki](https://github.com/stsrki)) [Description Fix, Sequential UUID]

Fixes:
- [#600](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/600) - Migrate.exe --help doesn't work correctly contributed by ([NetworKKnighT](https://github.com/NetworKKnighT))

[List of all changes](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/compare/1.5.0...1.5.1)

Features:
- [#467](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/467) - Allow many assemblies to contribute IMigrations in the same migrations run ([JulianRooze](https://github.com/JulianRooze))
- [#529](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/529) - Support SAP HANA Database ([FabioNascimento](https://github.com/FabioNascimento))
- [#570](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/570) - Add options to generate migrations without database connection ([andrewhanson](https://github.com/andrewhanson))
- [#577](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/577) - Added ability to set Transaction Behavior and use Tags with MaintenanceAttribute ([unrealguard](https://github.com/unrealguard))

Improvements:

- [#573](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/573) - Provides an ability to create a column and specify that the timezone information should be stored with the date ([dealproc](https://github.com/dealproc))

Fixes:
- [#572](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/572) - SetExistingRowsTo: will not longer change column length ([mstancombe](https://github.com/mstancombe))

- [#576](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/576) - Firebird: quote only keywords otherwise quoting should be optional and not the default & various ([amroel](https://github.com/amroel))
- [#568](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/issues/568) - Oracle: Fix Escaping of Guid's, for insertdataexpression etc ([tommarien](https://github.com/tommarien))

Various:
- [#565](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/565) Albacore upgrade to 2.0 ([daniellee](https://github.com/daniellee))

[List of all changes](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/compare/1.4.0...1.5.0)

- [#562](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/562) - Oracle Alter Default constraints closes #551 contributed by Tom Marien ([tommarien](https://github.com/tommarien))
- [#561](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/561) - Support for Sqlserver2014 contributed by Daniel Lee ([daniellee](https://github.com/daniellee)) +Feature
- [#558](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/558) - Fix for #398 contributed by Dan Corder ([DanCorder](https://github.com/DanCorder)) +fix
- [#537](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/pull/537) - Added TimestampedMigrationAttribute contributed by Eric Burcham ([ericburcham](https://github.com/ericburcham)) +Feature

[List of all changes](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/compare/1.3.1...1.4.0)

Improvements:
- Runners report innerexceptions @spaccabit 
- VersionTableMetaData now includes AppliedOn column @tommarien

Bugs
- Oracle.ManagedDataAccess.dll is now included in package @tommarien
- Fix insert expression timespan property @spaccabit 

[List of all changes](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/compare/1.3.0...1.3.1)

Features:
- DB2 Support @jrackley
- Oracle Managed Data Access (.NET 4+ only) @cjundt
- Maintenance attribute, which will allow you to execute maintenance task at specific stages @ashmind
- SetExistingRowsTo fluent api addition to alter table expressions (adding columns which are not nullable) @mstancombe

Improvements:
- Passwords from connectionstrings are now masked in output @tohogan trough @tommarien
- UniqueConstraint now has params string[] as signature instead of string [] @tommarien
- Oracle : SystemMethods.CurrentDateTime @KidFashion

Bugs:
- Oracle: Sequence generation @tommarien
- Firebird: a lot of bugs should got squashed @fluffynuts @chstein 

[List of all changes](https://github.com/schambers/fluentmigrator/compare/1.2.1...1.3.0)

Pleased to announce that FluentMigrator.Runner package is now made available by core team, thanks to package owners to add us as owner ! This should greatly improve discoverability of Sql server specific extensions.

Improvements & Features:
- Split Fluentmigrator runner assembly into a new FluentMigrator.Runner package @jrolstad
- Added 'GO' statements to file output when targeting Ms SQL Server @cliechty
- SQLite namespace mismatch @tommarien
- Support multi-statement scripts in Oracle Db @AndreyUtka
- Profiles are now found in alphabetical order, allows arbitrary ordering @jochenvangasse

Bug fixes:
- Profile does not get executed when a non-zero version parameter is specified @rogersillito

Improvements & Features:
- Insert.IntoTable("").Row()  allows providing data with dictionary in addition to dynamic  [@tommarien](https://github.com/tommarien)
- MySql: LONGTEXT mapping added  [@eff0880](https://github.com/eff0880)
- Migrations are now lazy loaded at startup, this to reduce build up time [@wilbit](https://github.com/wilbit)
- Added Constraint("name").Exists() to SchemaTable syntax  [@WilliamRoxit](https://github.com/WilliamRoxit)
- Enable using table descriptions with non default schema [@avinash9587](https://github.com/avinash9587)

Bug fixes:
- Validation of migrations will no longer generate exception if migrations contains more then 1 of same type [@mihaipetrutiu](https://github.com/mihaipetrutiu) via @tommarien
- Oracle: Updated the default mapping of Int64 to NUMBER(19,0) to match the default type mapping [@kramerpr](https://github.com/kramerpr)
- Firebird: AsString() now defaults to varchar(255) [@kingpong](https://github.com/kingpong)

name: 1.1.2.1 patch
body:
Released: Wednesday, January 1, 2014
- Newly added description feature was declared in the Migration as String(int.MaxValue), which caused issues on some processors like MySqlProcessor because of missing type map or just not possible. We've changed the migration so it now declares it as : AsString(1024) which should cause no issues. Even if you where using 1.1.2 before on a supported db like for instance SqlServer.
- From now on even if you don't provide a description in your migration attribute the description column contains the migration class name.

Released: Sunday, December 29, 2013

Improvements & Features:
- Added description support for tables and columns on MS Sql Server and Oracle [@stefan-ojog](https://github.com/stefan-ojog)
- Added description support for migrations [@drucik86](https://github.com/drucik86)
- It is now possible to stop fluentmigrator from deleting the version schema [@tommarien](https://github.com/tommarien)

Bug fixes:
- SqlServer: SqlServer2000Processor sql template error [@starpeng](https://github.com/starpeng)
- VersionLoader should read version column by name so it does not matter in which order the columns are in the table [@masongup](https://github.com/masongup)

Various:
- FluentMigrator is now attributed with CLSCompliant [@lahma](https://github.com/lahma)
